website_summaries.verdict: It stands out for its attractive style, but has a lot more to offer in the way of looks than quality and accessories.
pros: Sports a vividly-colored canopy with 50 UPF protection and tilt pole
Comes with a matching carrying bag
Lightweight design that's easy to carry
cons: Doesn't come with an anchor – it must be purchased separately
Has the tendency to flip inside out in windy conditions

customer_reviews.title: I think this product is really good. I used to have a umbrella just like ...
customer_reviews.text: I think this product is really good. I used to have a umbrella just like this and it works really well at the beach I would give this 5 stars but the bag that they gave you really sucks I don't know why it has some clear plastic attached to the back because that just ripped off literally the moment I took the umbrella out of the bag and the strap that comes with it is very flimsy and seems like it'll break very easily
customer_reviews.author: Moorice

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: Bottom heavier, top lighter compared to most. I buy new umbrellas every year. I live where it's hot all summer and can be gusty. Even my more expensive base and umbrellas haven't made it a year before crashing and breaking. This looks mid-price but holds up better because of the weight distribution. Oct 2018: still only umbrellas to make it through a summer unscathed. Only brand for me now. Just very sun-bleached.
customer_reviews.author: Bronterae

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the beach!
customer_reviews.text: We just spent a week in the Outer Banks, NC and this umbrella held up like a champ in the beach winds for 5 straight days! We kept waiting for it to give way under the constant wind battering against it, but it held up just fine. VERY pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: HChavous8713

customer_reviews.title: Big, colorful and stand up to the breeze
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is amazing! It’s very large but not too big that you can’t pack it for the beach ! It super colorful and the breeze is not match for it . We use this nearly every single day , with 3 kids 4 and under we are outside playing , swimming and have water fun and this provides a good amount of shade. I am able to put it up and tow it down without the help of my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  This is beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this umbrella to not only use at the beach or on other outdoor trips, but also to use in my vegetable garden. I live in the Arizona desert, so shade is a priority when I am doing garden tasks. I stick this in a corner of whatever raised bed I am working in and have instant shade! And the color of the fabric is gorgeous. It's a breeze to put up and move around the garden. It also tilts. Quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Della Greenawalt

customer_reviews.title: Great Umbrella and Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great umbrella for the price. It opens and closes just like the old fashioned umbrellas-easy push up to catch, and depress the catch to take down. It looks like the cover comes off easily for washing, and while it's a plastic-y material, it does a great job of keeping out rain, sun, and so far, staying clean. I love this umbrella; I bought one for our local library, and I plan to buy one for myself before next season.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy Bellessis

customer_reviews.title: Ammsun 6.5 ft. beach umbrella provides excellent shade
customer_reviews.text: The Ammsun Outdoor Umbrella arrived neatly packed in a back that can be slung over the shoulder. It is light weight without being flimsy. It is amazing how well this umbrella provided shade. The 6.5 ft. diameter umbrella has a comfortable shade radius for 2-3 people. For more than 3 people I would recommend a larger size. The open top flap helps to keep the umbrella stable in breezy weather. No more sunburn at the beach!
customer_reviews.author: Grauzellen

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors, right size
customer_reviews.text: Nice colors, right size. I bought this to use as a sun umbrella in our backyard. Air vent and tilt features were important. I also wanted one with a red color in it, this one comes close, it's a bit orange. We cut a few inches off to get the right size for our pot. There are a few tiny holes along the stitched lines of the umbrella. We will see how it holds up. Disappointing is that there is no tie-down strap. I guess one could make one out of the carrying case!
customer_reviews.author: Mel W

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: We really like this umbrella! It was exactly what we were looking for to use during our beach vacation last week. We did have an issue with one of the supports breaking, but the company instantly made it right and I had a brand new umbrella within a few days after we returned from our vacation. I definitely recommend buying from this seller!
customer_reviews.author: LisaB

customer_reviews.title: Great beach umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: I have another umbrella that I've used for 4 years. This one seems like it will last just as long. It's perfect for an all day beach adventure. We typically stay out for at least 4 - 6+ hours and this umbrella kept me perfectly shaded throughout the day. No sunburn. I did end up buying an anchor for the sand but only because it was REALLY windy. Otherwise, it stays put.
customer_reviews.author: ilikestuff

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Very study for the price, feels like a sixty dollar umbrella. Like the fact that the top can be tilted if you want. Lightweight for the size and feels durable.
customer_reviews.author: Awesomebike

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Great price and great umbrella , this umbrella covers well and tilts which is nice. It held up great in the Jersey beach winds and it assembles and comes apart very easy. Im glad we purchased this and not the Tommy bahama for close to $100!! This works just as well and the colors makes it easy to find your spot on the sand after coming out of the ocean
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Broke after only a few months
customer_reviews.text: I did not want to write this negative review, but I tried to find the company's website to e-mail them directly regarding my broken umbrella and the warranty process, but i was not successful and so here we are. My biggest problem is that i purchased this umbrella about 6 months ago and the adjustment latch where you can angle the umbrella shade portion broke and the umbrella will not sit up on the normal vertical postion by itself. Because of this, the umbrella has been essentially rendered usueless and it's frustrating because I did not see a way to contact support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very nice, bright beach umbrella
customer_reviews.text: nice big bold stripes in bright colors.. Just what we wanted for the beach....[so family/friends can see where we're sitting !!]
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Great for beach outings and picnics.
customer_reviews.text: We use this all the time. It is the perfect size for the beach or picnics. The color is as vibrant as shown in the picture. The fabric seems to be durable. I love that it comes with a cover. I would definitely recommend this umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: J Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Love this umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I made this purchase! This umbrella is great to use and seems very sturdy. We've only used it once and there was only light winds but it held up great. The tilting feature is awesome and the colors are bright!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy M

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella
customer_reviews.text: So far so good and I have used it about 10 times
customer_reviews.author: mitchell h anton

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Great company
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these umbrellas for our trip to the shore. Both performed extremely well. They are very sturdy in a strong ocean breeze. Unfortunately an unusually strong gust of wind caused the umbrella to break at the plastic swivel that makes the umbrella tilt. I contacted Ammsun support to report the issue. They couldn't have been any more helpful. Their response was quick. After explaining the issue and sending them pictures of the break, they informed us that a new umbrella would be shipped. It is a pleasure to deal with a company that stand behind their products. I look forward to my next purchase from Ammsun.
customer_reviews.author: joyce

customer_reviews.title: Tilt Mechanism Broke
customer_reviews.text: About the 6th trip to the beach the tilt mechanism broke and the umbrella flops over to the maximum tilt angle. It won't stand up straight. I put a heavy duty hose clamp on the pole so I can slide the clamp up the pole and keep the umbrella from tilting. I have to bring along a screw driver to tighten the clamp. The umbrella won't collapse with the hose clamp tightened in place. Other than that it's seems a pretty good umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Cary Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Total crap.
customer_reviews.text: Flipped inside out and broke with first gust of wind. Total waste of money, and left my family on vacation with no sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: yadayadayada

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight shade umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Nice lightweight umbrella. I like that it was reasonably priced; has a carry bag for easy transport and storage. Happy with my purchase with the exception that carry bag strap was cut. Seller sent damaged merchandise. Other than that, it's a nice umbrella. I like the tilt feature because it allows me to block the sun on extremely hot days. Love the color as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: we just came back from the beach and so glad we had this umbrella We had some strong winds ...
customer_reviews.text: we just came back from the beach and so glad we had this umbrella We had some strong winds a few time and with the air flap it helps get the air out. I do suggest getting the auger that is a must with winds at the beach. Our umbrella never went air bound..This umbrella does not have a handle to crank up or down. It goes straight up or down. A good umbrella for the price
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella at great price
customer_reviews.text: I really like this umbrella. I’ve used it on the beach twice so far and it holds up really well. I also like the fact that the sun cannot get through it. My girlfriends on Bralla let a lot of sun through But this umbrella has almost like a silver lining to it and it shades very well. I would definitely buy another one if I was looking for an umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: chip's mom

customer_reviews.title: Very Poorly Constructed. Thin metal parts arrived bent!
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is a complete waste of my time and money! It arrived with the tiny metal parts that keep it open bent inward so that it won’t even stay open with zero breeze. I”M SO ANNOYED because I spent time ordering it and waiting and now I have to pack it back up and return it. So incredibly annoying! My beach has a constant breeze and this is not strong at all!
customer_reviews.author: Peace Finder

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: cute umbrella. Sturdy. Has held up against the wind well
customer_reviews.author: Gianna

customer_reviews.title: Was upset at first, now very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Part 1: I was excited to use my umbrella then to realise mine only came with one part instead of two the pointy pole is missing. Part 2: Update: after realizing that parts of my umbrella was missing i emailed the company and in no time i received a replacement and not just with the part that was missing but the entire product, umbrella and all. I also received an apology. Five star to product and Five star to customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Jem H.

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella
customer_reviews.text: We've had this umbrella for 2 years and have used quite a bit at the windy outer banks beeches and along side rivers. No issues other than we wished it was bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel F90

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella is colorful, sturdy and provides great shade. We use it by the kids sand box. Does pretty well on a breezy day, but like most vented umbrellas doesn't like big gusts of wind. Despite being blown across the yard when a big gust hit it, the umbrella was unharmed and easy to fold and put back!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a great buy...
customer_reviews.text: There were holes in the umbrella where it was sewn. I bought two —one for a friend and one for me. Both had to be returned because of this defect. TMM
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a week at the beach
customer_reviews.text: Durable enough for the way we do our beach thing. We coupled it with one of those screw-like umbrella bases that anchor in the sand. It withstood some moderate winds the first day without flying away or collapsing. The rest of the week was near perfect and this umbrella did the job.
customer_reviews.author: BigDaddyNC

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: We had just terrible heat this summer and I had to be outside. I have trouble with that kind of extreme heat so this umbrella was incredibly helpful to me. I does need an auger, no matter the ground, sand or grass. I tried it in the grass and it went in with much difficulty. When I pulled it out, the point cover came off and I had to dig it out with my hand shovel. But I am not unhappy with my purchase. It is nice and big and sturdy for my purposes. I even used it in the garden while I was picking tomatoes. So helpful. Definitely need an auger tho.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Signorelli

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy umbrella that is designed for wind
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful first day of use, gusty sustained 20mph wind, with 30-40mph gusts on the beach. The whole top is designed perfectly to provide relief for the wind, yet provide sun protection and enough flex to avoid breakage. One star off on sturdiness because I easily dented the pole with my sand anchor. The poles are quite thin, but still firm and strong against the wind at this point.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: We took a trip to San Diego CA in June and made the mistack of not checking the contents before leaving/using. When we got to the beach and were setting up the bottom pole was missing so we couldn't use the umbrella. Had to apply extra sunscrean lotion to ensure we didn't get sun burned. Had to send back for a refund. Was a very nice umbrella, just wish all the parts were included so we could of used it.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but may not refold
customer_reviews.text: The very first time I took it to the beach, it refused to fold up at the end of the day. Its a plastic button that, when you push it, closes the umbrella. No such luck with mine. Several people nearby attempted to assist but with no luck. I couldn't even get it in my car so I left it behind. It was so pretty! Such a shame.
customer_reviews.author: mychances

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, easy to transport, works great!
customer_reviews.text: I use this at my granddaughter's Lacrosse tournaments and games. It's lightweight, easy to transport, works well for two people to sit under. If it's very windy, it will blow down, so proceed with caution. Have not used it at the beach, however, I did purchase a sand-spike/holder for it. Colors are bright and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: JKinSC

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the 1st time yesterday at the beach! It had nice coverage, looked great, and the head tilted to redirect the shade. Not sure of its durability yet. The beach was flat and there was little wind. The woman next to us had the exact same umbrella though!
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!
customer_reviews.text: I know this is made for the beach, but I bought two to place around my pool. They are kind of small, the pole isn't as long as other 6.5ft diameter umbrellas I've had in the past. They are sturdy and the color is very pretty! Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Got shade?
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my children’s soccer games as I don't like to bake in the sun while watching six year olds chase a ball. It folds up into an easy carrying pouch. I also got the ground spike to hold this up as it’s not able to be rammed into the grass.
customer_reviews.author: Zachery W.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy even on windy days
customer_reviews.text: Held up very well against east coast sea breezes. Compared to other umbrellas, it wiggled less and was able to stay open in higher winds. The only concern is about longevity- the umbrella spines are plastic and not steel. We will see if it holds up year after year.
customer_reviews.author: Poor Student

customer_reviews.title: Great for the beach!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this umbrella for our trip to Florida and didn't want to spend much so found this one and bought it. I wasn't expecting a whole lot for the money but was pleasantly surprised. I loved the design, that it tilts, and is lightweight! I wouldn't hesitate to recommend to anyone I know!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: We bought four of these for the beach and they are awesome. There was one day that winds were very, very strong and 2 of the umbrellas “took off”. However, everyone’s umbrellas on the beach that day were pretty much blowing out of the sand!
customer_reviews.author: CMK

customer_reviews.title: Light Wind Only
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t hold up past one season of use. It didn’t vent adequately and couldn’t withstand much wind without inverting. Several of the stays are ripped out or broken. If you insist on purchasing, be sure to buy a sand anchor.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Beach umbrella.
customer_reviews.text: Great umbrella. This is the second one that we have. The first one we bought at Costco and it lasted a long time (about 8 years). We live in a windy area so the umbrella's get jerked around a lot. Eventually, the first one broke. We replaced it with this one (even the same color as the one from Costco). Love the convenience of Amazon free shipping and delivered to the house.
customer_reviews.author: Lovetoshoponline

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time this weekend, and it worked perfectly on a Florida beach. It's really well made, sturdy and had a really nice sized shade area. We were under the shade, in the Florida sun, and we felt really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella has worked perfectly for our beach excursions. It held up in the wind and was reasonably priced. I purchased the base with it, and it has been easy to set up. Very lightweight and has a carrying case with strap. highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: CEC

customer_reviews.title: Does not last long if using in
customer_reviews.text: Only 4 months old and it has rips in it and we kept it covered unless we where using it. Rained once or twice on it but the material did not last long. We where hoping to get a blue one next but not after seeing the results of this one.
customer_reviews.author: MKD

customer_reviews.title: These were great for our beach trip!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these! Took them to the beach a couple of weeks ago. They worked perfectly. We had not problems with the wind. Love the tilt feature and carrying case. Also purchased the Ammsun anchor to go with them.
customer_reviews.author: RCRC27

customer_reviews.title: Colors not like picture, pretty flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t look like the blue colors in the picture. It has purple stripes and the green stripes are a darker green with purple stripes. If it wasn’t for the hassle of return shipping, I definitely wouldn’t keep it. It’s pretty flimsy and light weight. I bought to put on the pool deck and I’m sure the first time the wind catches it, it will be ruined. Updated review! One month later. In my backyard on the pool deck. Wind turned this umbrella inside out easily and the first time it happened it broke the poles. What a waste of money! It is now in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: kwh

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. The umbrella case was ripped at the seem when it arrived. Not realizing this, on my walk to the beach, the umbrella slid right out. I figured it’s an easy fix with needle and thread, but the actual umbrella was cheap. Didn’t really sit well in the sand. The slightest gust of wind knocked it over.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Di Stefano

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great unbrella for our little bistro set. We love it. Bright colors! We lost the bottom half of our pole during a move. Customer service was exceptional and fast! They responded and replaced immediately with no cost to us! Amazing
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job. We have the cork screw holders that ...
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job. We have the cork screw holders that you twist into the sand and this is not going anywhere with those. We live at the Outer Banks of NC and every outing to our favorite spot on Bodie Island you will see umbrellas flying in the area.
customer_reviews.author: ejvwsc

customer_reviews.title: Broke on 2nd use
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella broke the second time I used it. The plastic simply snapped. It was at best mildly windy and everyone else on the beach was able to use an umbrella so it was not due to excessive wind. Piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara D. McGivern

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first use.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the umbrella when I received it, but on the first use (sunny day with minimal wind) a gust of wind came and snapped the pole in half and sent the umbrella flying. I was so disappointed. It looks well made. I looked a lot before I ordered this one. I even ordered the piece that lets you hang your towel on the pole. I would like to request a replacement, as, maybe, this one was defective and another one would be fine. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Nellis

customer_reviews.title: Bent the first time we used it
customer_reviews.text: This was put into the sand by a seasoned umbrella-user who knows how to do these things. It was a breezy day, but by no means a crazy windy day. When we got ready to go, we were shocked to see the metal pole bent in two places! Yes, it's lightweight, pretty, and easy to carry, but that won't do you any good if it loses its stability with a bent pole! Returning!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Miller

customer_reviews.title: For my Covid shelter in place
customer_reviews.text: I got this to make a pretend restaurant outside In the front. A place where we are eating during this Covid craziness. It has a nice case too. This is the second umbrella I’ve bought.
customer_reviews.author: donut girl

customer_reviews.title: COLORFUL AND JUST THE RIGHT SIZE
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is perfect for my small patio. The colors match my furniture cushions perfectly and it is of good quality. Very happy with my purchase. Would recommend. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: LanieB

customer_reviews.title: My husbands best friend!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect at the beach! Provided perfect coverage for my husband as I tanned. Kept the sun off and he only applied sunblock once since this was spf 50. We suggest getting one of the sand screw in plastic umbrella anchors to go with it, stayed up and didn’t blow away! Also great colors and lightweight!
customer_reviews.author: A. Lipscomb

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Although it has not been tested on the beach yet - I am very impressed with the quality of this umbrella - nice sturdy poles - and what appears to be durable fabric. Colors are bright and vivid.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: It's PERFECT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is exactly what I've hunted high and low for. The colors are bright but not too beachy. I wanted something for my back country setting deck. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Marta W Betts

customer_reviews.title: Thin material, locking open clip fragile.
customer_reviews.text: Very thin material, carry bag was un-sewn at closed end, lock on pole holding it open (like regular umbrellas) is very small plastic so it'll likely break, may send back.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Great size and color. We used this at the beach during an extremely windy day and it was fine. Only thing I wish, is that the height could be adjusted. There were times where I wanted it to be a little lower to the ground. Other than that, great umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: mommaleis

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our chairs by the pool and they won't clip on them. The clip is only for certain chairs evidently. The umbrellas are nice we just can't use them how we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Clanton

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Within the first 15 minutes a mild gust blew up the beach and broke the spokes and plastic angle assembly. If you're on a beach with zero wind, maybe. I'm looking for one that is ALL metal.
customer_reviews.author: ZooMama

customer_reviews.title: Ripped carry bag/umbrella replaced
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella is nice and large. I like the vent for wind so it does not blow away. The carry bag has about a 4 inch rip along the seam. I have sent the company an email. I want to keep the umbrella. I have not heard from the company and when I ordered this from Amazon, it did not have "free return" A week after, I received a replacement umbrella and carrier bag. Not sure if Ammsun or Amazon sent the replacement. I love the umbrella and am very pleased with Amazon and Ammsun.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A  Rose

customer_reviews.title: Is just like the photo
customer_reviews.text: Is just like the photo. The colors are vibrant and the quality is okay. Material is nice and seems to hold up under wind at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: beach baby 47

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella - no issues at all
customer_reviews.text: Great umbrella - would definitely get it again if needed but this seems like it will last a while - get one if you’re in the market
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C.

customer_reviews.title: Works well if there’s a breeze blowing
customer_reviews.text: Great on the beach for shade and works well when it is windy out there. Carry bag working well for me and keeps the umbrella clean.
customer_reviews.author: Killala

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i was looking for!!!! My daughter has a sun allergy & can't be In the sun long. We used this umbrella the other day at the River and it was great. It's easy to set up and provides a great amount of shade. Totally worth the amount we paid for it. Will be buying another one very soon.
customer_reviews.author: kai

customer_reviews.title: Rafting in the wind
customer_reviews.text: We took four of these down the river through desolation canyon. 2 out of the four did just fine, the other two bent at the joints. It took some duct tape to fix for the rest of the trip but they made it through. It was a nice size for a 13-16 foot raft to shade the person rowing. There were some substantial gusts of wind and for the most part they worked for what we needed for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Moe and Jac

customer_reviews.title: Great colors!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I live near the beach and use this often. I like that this isn’t a common color scheme for a beach umbrella, so it’s easy to spot my things from the water!
customer_reviews.author: Siestakey14

customer_reviews.title: Good beach umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty good, very good size beach umbrella. The umbrella works just fine. I gave 4 out of 5 stars because the handle strap on the carrying case was torn, so I wasn't pleased about that.
customer_reviews.author: Yulia W.

customer_reviews.title: Carry Bag is Useless
customer_reviews.text: Colors true to picture and very pretty. Used one day so far and umbrella held up well. Carry bag seam ripped during carrying out at end of day which could have easily resulted in a trip. I repaired seam and hope it will be good enough to carry under arm vs. over shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Jamin

customer_reviews.title: great beach umbrella
customer_reviews.text: we had one really windy day where we just couldn't get this to stay up, but overall no issues
customer_reviews.author: bell

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Broke the first day we had it at the beach. Although we were walking the wind switched on shore and it blew up in the air and a few of the tines bent.
customer_reviews.author: marksharky

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, nice color and size
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, nice color and size, but the product was delivered with some small tears in the fabric and had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Marta

customer_reviews.title: Its shade
customer_reviews.text: Lock to stay open a bit flimsy. Haven't used on the beach yet but it's a good looking, nicely made umbrella and the bag it comes with makes things easier to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Good way to create some shade in a yard with no trees.
customer_reviews.text: This has been awesome for the summer. We put it up in the back yard. The kids can sit and play under it while my wife is watering the flowers. It creates just enough shade for two toddlers to sit under in this HOT summer.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle B. Rickey

customer_reviews.title: nice and colorful when used on our beach get away ...
customer_reviews.text: nice and colorful when used on our beach get away even without our glasses we knew where we were sitting! love this umbrella
customer_reviews.author: Lynette lowery

customer_reviews.title: It rusts
customer_reviews.text: I put this in a built-in holder in my pool. A wind blew it out of the holder - I took it out of the pool and it has started to rust.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what i needed
customer_reviews.text: We had a last minute trip to the beach, and i didnt want to be exposed all day. This was the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: Did not last long!
customer_reviews.text: The Problem I had with this Umbrella was something broke/snapped at the area where you can Tilt, now it does not stand up straight...It's now garbage for me! Do Not Buy!
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is not worth a dollar.....there is no way for it to dig down into the sand. It doesn’t even stand up properly and can’t be dug into sand. Just awful
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Poor Construction
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. We bought two and they both broke the 1st day on the beach. Boo!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Kornovich

customer_reviews.title: excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works great, rather large, so plenty of shade for couple of people. Wind resistant somewhat, and you can adjust angle. Have been using it all summer
customer_reviews.author: Critic

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for great price. Very durable vibrant colors. I use frequently and thought the wear and tear would show by now but its still going strong. Its just an umbrella dont gotta spend alot on it just get this one. No damage on box or product when it arrived would highly recommend buying from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: EdgeMax

customer_reviews.title: Used it at the beach. Worked perfectly. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it at the beach. Worked perfectly. I also have one of those sand diggers that comes in real handy to get the pool deep enough into the sand to not worry about it flying away ir tipping over.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great beach umbrella for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great beach umbrella. Light weight and very sturdy uneven with light winds.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up and take down. like that it tilts. like the color. Seems sturdy enough but I just use it on my suburban patio so not as challenging perhaps as a day on the shore.
customer_reviews.author: Momala

customer_reviews.title: So wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for a trip to the beach and we use it daily outside. It’s held up, and still looks and works amazing.
customer_reviews.author: vincent

customer_reviews.title: Rainbow Umbrella Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous umbrella that is made to take the wind!! I have used this NEW umbrella on very windy days - the umbrella is made very well! Easy to pack into matching umbrella bag. This is a great price and quality product. I know good merchandise and this umbrella is good to go. At the end of the summer I will give you an update.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love the bag
customer_reviews.text: The plastic holder that is suggested as an additional purchase, you turn it into the sand, is not the best- maybe a rubber mallet would work better but the umbrella has held up to the strong ocean breezes
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Great for beach days
customer_reviews.text: Easy to bring to the beach and easy to stick in the sand. Does the trick for shade on a sunny day
customer_reviews.author: Galen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Pool
customer_reviews.text: It is very pretty and matches our pool well. It seems very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very strong
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect fit to put on my roller no more sitting in sun sturdy
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: About what one would expect for the price. I’m pleased with them. I bought 3. Not much fading yet.
customer_reviews.author: Pearl Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Colors are bright and material is beefy. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: Assembled easily. Pretty sturdy. Big enough to cover but compact enough to fit into the car. Fast delivery. Ready for the beach!!
customer_reviews.author: Dancing flower

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: We live on Lake Michigan, and we used this all summer. It’s sturdy and colorful.
customer_reviews.author: Kelynn

customer_reviews.title: A hit with the neighbors
customer_reviews.text: I am using this umbrella in my driveway patio for visiting with neighbors.I can actually walk underneath . Love the way it tilts with the movement of the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made umbrella
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful umbrella and looks like it’s made of good quality materials. I haven’t tested on those windy fishing trips on the pier yet so hopefully it will not fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Juany Safi

product_meta.title: AMMSUN 6.5 ft Outdoor Patio Beach Umbrella Sun Shelter with Tilt Air Vent Carry Bag Multicolor Red
feature_bullets: ☂ 100% UV PROTECTION: Looking for a premium beach umbrella for your beach travel? AMMSUN large beach umbrella provides a perfect solution for you. It has a silver UV coating on the inside of this beach umbrella for extra UV protection. Easy push button tilt adjustment allows it to track the sun and maximize your shade all times of the day.

☂ PREMIUM QUALITY: AMMSUN outdoor sun umbrella provides you peace of mind due to exceptional stability in High Wind and Rain. The premium quality design construction is achieved through 1.26 inch premium Steel alloy pole and fiber ribs, which makes it more durable and stronger.
☂ INCREASED STABILITY: Vent on the top is designed to promotes air flow, allow for the umbrella to combat high winds, it will be more stable.

☂ LIGHTWEIGHT& PORTABLE: It can be efficiently disassembled and stowed away quickly, you can put the beach umbrella into the carry bag , and bring it anywhere without burden. Suitable for all kinds of occasions, such as the patio, beach parties, picnics, and camping.
Optional Sand Anchor device ASIN:B01EHMC9EQ (sold separately) is recommended. It's built to hold your umbrellas steady.For any possible questions, contact us via support@ammsun.com
